sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"住处"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: lodging, accommodation, apartment, flae, quarters, suite
means: lodging ： 常用lodgins,指临时租借的房间或宿舍。
种居住住所，一般指暂时下榻之地。
apartment ： 通常指占用或居住时间较长的成套房间，在美国比较常用。
flat ： 多用于英国、澳大利亚和新西兰。指同一层建筑物上组成一个居住单元的几个房间。
quarters ： 指某一部分人集中的居住区。
suite ： 可泛指任何设备完善的一套房间，但多指包括起居室、卧室和浴室的陈设较豪华的套间。

word_mean: 调节：尤指眼对不同距离之调节(见插图)
眼调节时的变化A.睫状肌收缩
D.晶状体前表面凸出度增加。
船上居住舱室、厨房、餐厅、盥洗室、浴室、厕所、娱乐场所等与人员生活有关的各种舱室的统称。

sentence.Network_en: His instinct would be to seek a new accommodation with the nationalists.
sentence.Network_cn: 他本能的反应会是寻求与民族主义者取得新的和解。

sentence.Network_en: The authority must make suitable accommodation available to the family.
sentence.Network_cn: 当局必须给这个家庭提供适当的食宿条件。

sentence.Network_en: Volunteers receive £21 pocket money each week, accommodation and expenses.
sentence.Network_cn: 志愿者每周领到21英镑的零用钱，免费住宿，还得到一笔生活费。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin accommodatio(n-), from accommodare 'fit one thing to another' (see accommodate)

entry.def: Accommodation is used to refer to buildings or rooms where people live or stay.

example.ex: The government will provide temporary accommodation for up to three thousand people...
example.tran: 政府将给多达3,000人提供临时住处。

example.ex: Prices start at £1,095 per person, including flights, hotel accommodation and various excursions...
example.tran: 起价为单人1,095英镑，包括机票、旅店住宿和各种出游费用。

entry.tran: （楼房或交通工具内的）空间，座位，铺位
entry.def: Accommodation is space in buildings or vehicles that is available for certain things, people, or activities.

example.ex: The school occupies split-site accommodation on the main campus...
example.tran: 该学院分散在主校区不同地点。

example.ex: Some trains carry bicycles, but accommodation is restricted so a reservation is essential.
example.tran: 有些火车可以运载自行车，但因空间有限需要提前预订。

entry.def: An accommodation is an agreement between different people which enables them to exist together without trouble.

example.ex: His instinct would be to seek a new accommodation with the nationalists...
example.tran: 他本能的反应会是寻求与民族主义者取得新的和解。

example.ex: Religions, to survive, must make accommodations with the larger political structures that nurture them.
example.tran: 为了生存，宗教必须同其赖以存在的更大的政治体系相调和。

means.word_mean: 1. making or becoming suitable; adjusting to circumstances
3. in the theories of Jean Piaget: the modification of internal representations in order to accommodate a changing knowledge of reality
4. living quarters provided for public convenience;
5. the act of providing something (lodging or seat or food) to meet a need
6. (physiology) the automatic adjustment in focal length of the lens of the eye

auth_sentence.res_content: The Faculty will provide assistance in finding suitable accommodation.

stems_affixes.word_buile: accommodate向…提供住处+ion动作或状态等→accommodation住处,膳宿
communicate交流;通讯+ion动作或状态等→communication传达,信息
congratulate祝贺,庆贺+ion动作或状态等→congratulation祝词,贺辞
consolidate巩固,加强+ion动作或状态等→consolidation巩固,合并
correlate使相互关联+ion动作或状态等→correlation相互关系,相关[性]
dictate口述,口授+ion动作或状态等→dictation
elevate举起,提拔+ion动作或状态等→elevation上升,提高
eliminate除去;淘汰;排[删,消]除+ion动作或状态等→elimination排除,除去,消除,消灭

stems_affixes.value_cn: 用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
stems_affixes.word_buile: formulate用公式表示;系统地阐述+ion动作或状态等→formulation用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
imitate模仿+ion动作或状态等→imitation模仿,效法
introduce引入,介绍+tion动作或状态等→introduction介绍
irrigate灌溉+ion动作或状态等→irrigation灌溉
reduce减少,缩小+tion动作或状态等→reduction减少

stems_affixes.value_cn: 关系,联系,叙述,故事,亲戚
stems_affixes.word_buile: relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ion动作或状态等→relation关系,联系,叙述
reproduce生殖;再现;繁殖+tion动作或状态等→n.繁殖,再现,复制品
requisite需要的+ion动作或状态等→requisition征用,要求

stems_affixes.value_cn: 翻译,译文,转化,调任,转换[物][数]平移
stems_affixes.word_buile: translate翻译,解释;转化+ion动作或状态等→translation翻译,译文,转化

Sentence.sentence: Last night 40,000 people rented accommodation from a service that offers 250,000 rooms in 30,000 cities in 192 countries.
Those whose accommodation had more natural views showed an improvement of 19%; those who had the same improvement in material surroundings but no nice view improved just 4%.

means.word_mean: 住处(尤指仅供短期使用的);停留处

sentences.en: They provided comfortable accommodations for visitors.
sentences.cn: 他们为旅客提供舒适的住处。

jushi.english: The parties concerned have come to accommodation.
jushi.chinese: 有关各方已经达成谅解。

jushi.english: We have first and third class accommodation on this flight.
jushi.chinese: 本次航班我们有头等舱和三等舱。
